roleset.name: lift, raise

example.name: hoist by your own petard
example.text: A huge ANC flag, with black, green and gold stripes, was hoisted [*]over the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house, while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves.
example.arg: A huge ANC flag, with black, green and gold stripes,
[*]over the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house,
while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves.

roleset.note: HOIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hoist' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from hoist.01-v predicate notes)
